root.name: City of Wonder
root.description: City of Wonder is all about building a city...and an empire. As you progress, you'll not only experience a traditionally fantasy/medieval world, but also pass through the Stone Age, Classical Age, Modern Age, and beyond. Players will have a chance to get involved in just about every aspect of building a prosperous empire, such as construction, increasing capacity, keeping people happy, researching, economic managements, and diplomatic encounters.
